Package alix.lucene.search

Class BitsFromQuery

java.lang.Object
alix.lucene.search.BitsFromQuery
public class BitsFromQuery
extends java.lang.Object
A query giving results as bits. Code from QueryBitSetProducer.java https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/blob/master/lucene/join/src/java/org/apache/lucene/search/join/QueryBitSetProducer.java Rely on the default LRU lucene cache, instead of an hard cache.
Author:
fred
